name: amicompat-mcp
description: MCP server for auditing web codebase Baseline compatibility - TypeScript native

scripts.test:integration: npm run build && npm run test:cli && npm run test:parsers
scripts.test:parsers: npm run test:parser:js && npm run test:parser:css && npm run test:parser:html
scripts.test:parser:js: echo 'const x = a?.b ?? c;' > test.js && node dist/cli.js test-parse test.js && rm test.js
scripts.test:parser:css: echo '@container { .test { display: flex; } }' > test.css && node dist/cli.js test-parse test.css && rm test.css
scripts.test:parser:html: echo '<dialog>Test</dialog><input type="date">' > test.html && node dist/cli.js test-parse test.html && rm test.html
